data.title: 95 R&B Wedding Songs to Play at Your Reception
data.meta_description: The best way to bring heart and soul to your reception is through a carefully curated playlist of R&B wedding songs and albums. Here, we put together a list of the 95 best tracks for you and your partner to consider.
data.text:
There's no better way to bring heart and soul to a wedding reception than with a perfectly curated playlist of R&B tracks. From “Summer Rain,” by Carl Thomas to "Weak," by SWV and "Tonight (Best You Ever Had)," by John Legend, the smooth words and melodies from your favorite rhythm and blues artists will be able to captivate the loving and joyful essence of your nuptials. Not to mention, R&B wedding songs can appeal to individuals from all generations and walks of life, as these tunes are forever universal, like "At Last," by Etta James, "Because of You," by Ney-Yo, and "By Your Side," by Sade.

Whether you're looking for a love song that'll pull at your guest's heartstrings or an upbeat track to get everyone moving on the dance floor, there's an R&B wedding song and album perfect for your big day—and with the right playlist, you'll be able to groove with your partner from dusk till dawn. That's why we put together an assortment of 95 tracks to help set the vibes for your upcoming celebration. Here, check out our roundup of R&B wedding songs to add to your ceremony and reception playlist.

01 of 95

“Before I Let Go,” by Maze & Frankie Beverly

Lyrics of Love: “You know, I thank God sun rises and shines on you/You know there's nothing, nothing, nothing I would not do”

02 of 95

“Ain’t Nobody,” by Chaka Khan

Lyrics of Love: “Happened so naturally/I did not know it was love”

03 of 95

"Find Someone Like You," by Snoh Aalegra

Lyrics of Love: "I've been waitin' my whole life, to find someone like you/Find someone like you/Maybe I, I want this, I want this to last forever/Maybe I, I want this, can we make this last forever?"

04 of 95

“Caught Up in the Rapture,” by Anita Baker

Lyrics of Love: “Nothing else can compare/When I feel the magic of you”

05 of 95

"Boo'd Up," by Ella Mai

Lyrics of Love: "Head over heels in love/Right in front of you, ain't gotta look no more baby (Ha)/I wanna build this love"

06 of 95

“At Your Best (You Are Love),” by Aaliyah

Lyrics of Love: “But at your best you are love/You're a positive motivating force within my life”

07 of 95

"Promise," by Ciara

Lyrics of Love: "There's nothing I won't do/To spend my life with you/I'll give my all to you/I promise that I will never lie to you, boy"

08 of 95

“Fortunate,” by Maxwell

Lyrics of Love: “Fortunate, to have you girl/I'm so glad, you're in my world”

09 of 95

“Here and Now,” by Luther Vandross

Lyrics of Love: “Here in my heart I believe/Your love is all I'll ever need”

10 of 95

“If I Ever Fall in Love (Acapella),” by Shai

Lyrics of Love: “But to my satisfaction/Baby you were more than just a face”

11 of 95

“Spend My Life With You,” by Eric Benet (featuring Tamia)

Lyrics of Love: “And I never knew what my life was for/But now that you're here I know for sure”

12 of 95

“Always and Forever,” by Heatwave

Lyrics of Love: “And I know tomorrow will still be the same/'Cause' we've got a life of love that won't ever change”

13 of 95

“Happily Ever After,” by Case

Lyrics of Love: “I will be your man/Your protector, your best friend”

14 of 95

“Summer Rain,” by Carl Thomas

Lyrics of Love: “I feel her kisses on me even when she's gone/Can't wait 'till she gets home”

15 of 95

"Lost Without U," by Robin Thicke

Lyrics of Love: "I'm lost without you/Can't help myself/How does it feel/To know that I love you, baby?"

16 of 95

“By Your Side,” by Sade

Lyrics of Love: “When you're on my outside, baby, and you can't get in/I will show you, you're so much better than you know”

17 of 95

“You Are,” by Charlie Wilson

Lyrics of Love: “Tell me how can I be so lucky/That you'd fall down from heaven for me”

18 of 95

“Share My Life,” by Kem

Lyrics of Love: “Your my dream and my joy/My heart belongs to you girl”

19 of 95

“Love,” by Musiq Soulchild

Lyrics of Love: “Many nights I've cried from the things you do/Felt like I could die from the thought of losing you”

20 of 95

“All My Tomorrows,” by Kenny Lattimore

Lyrics of Love: “Write your name on my heart/You’re the one that I need in my life and my arms”

21 of 95

“All My Life,” by K-Ci & JoJo

Lyrics of Love: “And all my life I prayed for someone like you/And I thank God that I, that I finally found you”

22 of 95

“Back at One,” by Brian McKnight

Lyrics of Love: “I never would have made it very far/'Cause you know you've got the keys to my heart”

23 of 95

“Stay With You,” by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: “Oh I'll stay with you through the ups and the downs/Oh I'll stay with you when no one else is around”

24 of 95

“When I First Saw You,” by Jamie Foxx (featuring Beyoncé)

Lyrics of Love: “Then I found you and I have had the most beautiful dreams/Any man's ever had”

25 of 95

“I Gotta Be,” by Jagged Edge

Lyrics of Love: “Is it real, what I feel could it be you and me/'Til the end of time, never part”

26 of 95

“Love Ballad,” by L.T.D.

Lyrics of Love: “Loving you gave me something new/That I've never felt”

27 of 95

“Made to Love Ya,” by Gerald Levert

Lyrics of Love: “My time, to spend with ya forever/I was made, made to love ya”

28 of 95

“Forever My Lady,” by Jodeci

Lyrics of Love: “I'll never let you down/Lady believe in me”

29 of 95

“Exceptional,” by Babyface

Lyrics of Love: “Your love is exceptional/Born of a heart of gold”

30 of 95

“A Couple of Forevers,” by Chrisette Michele

Lyrics of Love: “And me and you are, built like armor/Nothing can't stop love from love”

31 of 95

“A Good Night,” by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: “I know it's gonna be a good night/I think I just met my wife (alright)”

32 of 95

“Have You Ever,” by Brandy

Lyrics of Love: “Have you ever loved somebody so much/It makes you cry”

33 of 95

“Let’s Stay Together,” by Al Green

Lyrics of Love: “Cause you make me feel so brand new/And I want to spend my life with you”

34 of 95

“That’s How Strong My Love Is,” by Otis Redding

Lyrics of Love: “I'll be the moon when the sun goes down/Just to let you know that I'm still around”

35 of 95

“If I Ain’t Got You,” by Alicia Keys

Lyrics of Love: “But everything means nothing/If I ain't got you, yeah”

36 of 95

“Happy,” by Ashanti

Lyrics of Love: “All my life, I've been searching for ya/Everyday, so glad that I found you boy”

37 of 95

“Sweet Love,” by Anita Baker

Lyrics of Love: “With all my heart, I love you baby/Stay with me, and you will see my arms will hold you, baby”

38 of 95

“For You,” by Kenny Lattimore

Lyrics of Love: “For you, I'd give a lifetime of stability/Anything you want of me”

39 of 95

“Candy,” by Cameo

Lyrics of Love: “There's no mistaking, I'm clearly taken/By the simple mere thought of you”

40 of 95

“I Wanna Be Your Lover,” by Prince

Lyrics of Love: “I want to turn you on, turn you out/All night long, make you shout”

41 of 95

“I Found Love (Cindy’s Song),” by Bebe and Cece Winans

Lyrics of Love: “When I found you/I found the rest of my life”

42 of 95

“At Last,” by Etta James

Lyrics of Love: “At last my love has come along/My lonely days are over and life is like a song”

43 of 95

“Endless Love,” by Lionel Richie and Diana Ross

Lyrics of Love: “My love, there's only you in my life/The only thing that's bright”

44 of 95

“I Believe in You And Me,” by Whitney Houston

Lyrics of Love: “I believe in dreams again/I believe that love will never end”

45 of 95

“Always,” by Atlantic Starr

Lyrics of Love: “Girl you are to me, all that a woman should be/And I dedicate my life to you always”

46 of 95

“Three Times a Lady,” by The Commodores

Lyrics of Love: “To feel you, to need you/There's nothing to keep us apart”

47 of 95

“Everything,” by Mary J. Blige

Lyrics of Love: “To me the first time I saw your face/I would fall so deep in love”

48 of 95

“Halo,” by Beyoncé

Lyrics of Love: “Standing in the light of your halo/I got my angel now”

49 of 95

“Never Too Much,” by Luther Vandross

Lyrics of Love: “There's not a minute, hour, day or night that I don't love you/You're at the top of my list 'cause I'm always thinking of ya”

50 of 95

“All This Love,” by DeBarge

Lyrics of Love: “And all that I have/I give my all to you”

51 of 95

“Thinkin Bout You,” by Frank Ocean

Lyrics of Love: “Or do you not think so far ahead?/'Cause I been thinkin' 'bout forever”

52 of 95

“Cherish the Day,” by Sade

Lyrics of Love: “You're ruling the way that I move/And I breathe your air”

53 of 95

“Baby Be Mine,” by Michael Jackson

Lyrics of Love: “Warm you in my arms and melt your fears away/Show you all the magic that a perfect love can”

54 of 95

“Best Thing That Ever Happened to Me,” by Gladys Knight & the Pips

Lyrics of Love: “'Cause for every moment that I've spent hurting/There was a moment that I spent, ah, just loving you”

55 of 95

“Candy Rain,” by Soul For Real

Lyrics of Love: “My love, do you ever dream of/Candy coated raindrops?”

56 of 95

“Ribbon in the Sky,” by Stevie Wonder

Lyrics of Love: “But what it is that was always meant/Is a ribbon in the sky for our love”

57 of 95

“I Like It,” by DeBarge

Lyrics of Love: “I like the way you comb your hair/And I like those stylish clothes you wear”

58 of 95

“Ordinary People,” by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: “Girl, I'm in love with you/This ain't the honeymoon”

59 of 95

“Love and Happiness,” by Al Green

Lyrics of Love: “Well, happiness is when you really feel good with somebody/But nothing wrong with being in love with someone”

60 of 95

“Love On Top,” by Beyoncé

Lyrics of Love: “I can feel the sun whenever you're near/Every time you touch me I just melt away”

61 of 95

“My Girl,” by The Temptations

Lyrics of Love: “I've got so much honey the bees envy me/I've got a sweeter song than the birds in the trees”

62 of 95

“All Night Long,” by The Mary Jane Girls

Lyrics of Love: “Oh, something's got me so excited, baby/A feeling I've been holdin' back so long”

63 of 95

“There Goes My Baby,” by Charlie Wilson

Lyrics of Love: “There goes my baby/There goes my destiny”

64 of 95

“Ain’t No Mountain High Enough,” by Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell

Lyrics of Love: “From that day on, I made a vow/I'll be there when you want me”

65 of 95

“Rock Wit’cha,” by Bobby Brown

Lyrics of Love: “Now that you are here with me/Baby, let's do it right”

66 of 95

“Lady,” by D’Angelo

Lyrics of Love: “You're my little baby, my darling baby/I swear you're the talk of the town”

67 of 95

“Love Like This,” by Faith Evans

Lyrics of Love: “The reasons are because of you/I can go on and make it through”

68 of 95

“Right Here,” by SWV (Human Nature Remix)

Lyrics of Love: “True love some don't believe in/That's just what I'm givin'”

69 of 95

“Love T.K.O.,” by Teddy Pendergrass

Lyrics of Love: “Tried to take control of the love/Love took control of me”

70 of 95

“Outstanding,” by The Gap Band

Lyrics of Love: “I really love the way you love me/Forever I'll be yours”

71 of 95

“The Lady In My Life,” by Michael Jackson

Lyrics of Love: “Just put your trust in my heart/And meet me in paradise”

72 of 95

“Nothing Even Matters,” by Lauryn Hill

Lyrics of Love: “See, I don't need no alcohol/Your love makes me feel ten feet tall”

73 of 95

“I’m Still In Love With You,” by Al Green

Lyrics of Love: “Well it seems to me/That I'm so wrapped up in your love”

74 of 95

“You’re the First, the Last, My Everything,” by Barry White

Lyrics of Love: “You're all I'm living for, your love I'll keep forevermore/First, you're the last, my everything”

75 of 95

“Just the Two of Us,” by Grover Washington (featuring Bill Withers)

Lyrics of Love: “When I think of you some time/And I wanna spend some time with you”

76 of 95

“Anniversary,” by Tony! Toni! Toné!

Lyrics of Love: “And I've only made plans to hold your little hand/It's our anniversary (echo) anniversary”

77 of 95

"Soon as I Get Home," by Faith Evans

Lyrics of Love: "But all I do is think about the way you make me feel/'Cause, baby, this love is so real"

78 of 95

"Weak," by SWV

Lyrics of Love: "Your love is so sweet/It knocks me right off of my feet/Can't explain why your love, it makes me weak"

79 of 95

"Cater 2 U," by Destiny's Child

Lyrics of Love: "Baby I'm happy you're home/Let me hold you in my arms/I just want to take the stress away from you"

80 of 95

"Tonight (Best You Ever Had)," by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: "Baby, tonight's the night I let you know/Baby, tonight's the night we lose control"

81 of 95

"Superstar" by Usher

Lyrics of Love: "I'm your number one fan, give me your autograph/Sign it right here on my heart (I'll be)"

82 of 95

"We Belong Together," by Mariah Carey

Lyrics of Love: "Who's gon' take your place? There ain't nobody better/Oh, baby, baby, we belong together"

83 of 95

"Differences," by Ginuwine

Lyrics of Love: "My whole life has changed (My whole life has changed)/Since you came in (since you came in)"

87 of 95

"U Know What's Up," by Donell Jones (featuring Lisa "Left Eye" Lopes)

Lyrics of Love: "Said I'm big on you and I'm wanting you/So tell me what's up (so tell me what's up, baby)"

88 of 95

"Let's Get Married," by Jagged Edge

Lyrics of Love: "Girl, let's just get married/I just wanna get married/Meet me at the altar in your white dress"

89 of 95

"Wifey," by Next

Lyrics of Love: "My only love, the only one/You're my wifey/Make me life complete, sweet"

90 of 95

"Why Don't We Fall in Love," by Amerie

Lyrics of Love: "You're all I'm thinking of (Why don't we fall?)/So why don't we, why don't we, why don't we fall in love?"

91 of 95

"Greatest Gift," by Jorja Smith

Lyrics of Love: "You're the greatest gift I've found/My time with you is everything"

92 of 95

"Love Me JeJe," by Tems

Lyrics of Love: "Because I love and I love and I love and I love you only (only)/Because I need and I need and I need and I need you more, yeah"

93 of 95

"You," by Lloyd (featuring Lil Wayne)

Lyrics of Love: "Can I be for real?/This is how I feel/I'm in need of love/So let's dip up out of here"

94 of 95

"All of Me," by John Legend

Lyrics of Love: "'Cause all of me/Loves all of you/Love your curves and all your edges/All your perfect imperfections"

95 of 95

"Until The End Of Time Song," by Justin Timberlake

Lyrics of Love: "'Cause if your love was all I had (all I had) in this life/That would be enough (enough) until the end of time (until the end of time)"
